summary: This document contains financial information related to a PayPal account associated with Peggy W. Ugland. It details account registration, user information, and transaction history, including amounts sent and received. The document is part of an investigation by law enforcement.

keyFacts: The PayPal account associated with Peggy W. Ugland was created on December 14, 2009.
The account has a total amount sent of USD 172.84 and no amounts received.
The account status is listed as open but unregistered and unverified.
Marc Lundberg is mentioned as a third party linked to the account's address.
Mark Lubin is the law enforcement officer requesting the information related to this account.
